alert.note: Alert for Lycoming; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:59PM EDT until July 24 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Southern Tioga County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Leonard Harrison State Park to Morris to Slate Run, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wellsboro, Morris, Blossburg, Covington, Arnot, Leetonia, Leonard Harrison State Park, Ralston, Ogdensburg, Cedar Run and Cammal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
